0.text:
If, like me, you want to live in a world where
men and women are completely equal, not just

5.text:
in theory but in actual practice, then you'd
better get used to being called a racist by

10.text:
women who call themselves feminists. Progressive
feminists, to be precise, or third wave feminists,

16.text:
as they're sometimes known. Personally, I'm
happy to be called any number of ugly names

21.text:
if it helps to draw attention in some small
way to the glaring fact that progressive feminists

27.text:
are traitors to their gender. It's entirely
thanks to their poisonous influence that when

31.text:
it comes to Islam the words 'feminist' and
'hypocrite' go together as seamlessly as the

36.text:
words 'dickless' and 'jihad'. Can I say that?
I ask because I read recently that a notorious

42.text:
group of hardline progressive feminist nutcases
have been enlisted to help censor social media

48.text:
and crack down on free speech that hurts people's
feelings, so I'd better be careful what I

52.text:
say here, otherwise... Wait. Did I hear a
click? Am I still here? Let's keep our fingers

59.text:
crossed and plough on. Everyone knows that
feminism has been morally bankrupted by the

66.text:
cowardly refusal of the ones with the biggest
mouths, the progressive feminists, to confront

70.text:
the greatest threat to women in the world
today, Muslim misogyny. I'll say it again

75.text:
for you girls who still have your fingers
in their ears. Muslim misogyny. We all know

80.text:
you want to ignore it. You couldn't have made
that any more obvious. But it would be nice

85.text:
if, just once in a while, you could say something
critical about it, just to reassure us that

89.text:
you're not quite the totally unprincipled
self-obsessed hypocrites we all think you

94.text:
are. No offence. Seems like the only time
progressive feminists make any noise about

99.text:
Muslim misogyny is when they're shouting people
down and calling them racists for opposing

103.text:
it. But then progressive feminists are not
real feminists. And yes, there are still some

109.text:
of them around. It's just that their voices
aren't heard as much because they tend to

113.text:
tell the unpleasant truth about Islamic immigration
and its consequences for women, and nobody

118.text:
wants to hear about any of that. So it's fingers
in ears, racist, racist, all men are rapists,

123.text:
tra-la-la-la. One thing progressive feminists
love is to challenge the patriarchy, as long

130.text:
as it's not the Muslim patriarchy that treats
women as actual possessions. Mustn't challenge

135.text:
that one, or you'll be racist. And if anyone
else challenges it, you should call them a

139.text:
racist. And a misogynist, if they answer you
back and you think you can get away with it.

144.text:
As long as it's not a Muslim man, of course.
Muslim men can't be misogynist, or racist,

150.text:
as that would be racist. You see, Muslim men
are at the top of the progressive feelings

155.text:
hierarchy of unreasonable oversensitive people
who must always be agreed with and never offended.

161.text:
Especially the ones with the great big unhygienic
bushy beards. They're right at the top of

166.text:
the pile, those boys. They even outrank loudmouthed
black lesbians, if you can believe it. So,

171.text:
of course this means that the number one rule
of progressive feminism is that you never

176.text:
draw any kind of attention to the plight of
women in the Muslim world being abused and

181.text:
persecuted every day by Muslim men. Being
forcibly married, being punished for being

188.text:
raped. And whatever you do, don't mention
the thousand women a year in Pakistan who

192.text:
are murdered by members of their own family.
If you do you'll be a far-right racist, you'll

198.text:
be excluded from the progressive bubble, the
dinner party invitations will quickly dry

203.text:
up, and then you might as well kill yourself.
If you don't mind me saying so. The progressive

210.text:
sell-out to Islamic misogyny has been so total,
we're witnessing the death of feminism. There's

216.text:
now such a complete lack of credibility, nobody
takes it seriously any more. Feminism is now

222.text:
seen as merely a playpen for crybabies and
bullies. Censorious small-minded safe-space

228.text:
harpies who hate being women, and who want
everyone else to compensate them for it. And

233.text:
they're such incorrigible whores to Islam,
especially to Muslim men. They defer to them

239.text:
so eagerly on women's rights, as if they have
an unhealthy desire to be dominated by Muslim

244.text:
men. I'm not saying they're attracted to them,
necessarily. They probably despise them as

249.text:
much as they despise all men. But, being progressives,
they despise themselves even more for being

255.text:
so racist about it, and subconsciously they
want to be punished. It's the only explanation

260.text:
for their behaviour that makes any sense.
So presumably for them an Islamic invasion

265.text:
of Europe couldn't have come at a better time,
because nobody knows how to punish a woman

270.text:
like a third world Muslim man, surely the
most inadequate human creature on the planet,

276.text:
with all due respect. Raised by his mother
to have no regard for women, and too stupid

281.text:
and selfish to know any better, his horizon
begins at the end of his penis, where his

286.text:
brain resides. Of course I'm not saying that
they're all like that. I wouldn't want to

291.text:
be some kind of racist. I'm sure it's just
a few bad apples, imported wholesale from

296.text:
bad apple land, the land of rape culture.
And millions more bad apples are on their

301.text:
way, you lucky ladies. Who's going to stop
them, the Greeks? And soon, when Europe is

306.text:
flooded from top to bottom with third world
Muslim bad apples doing what they do best,

312.text:
making themselves thoroughly unwelcome, then
progressive feminists with their 'Refugees

316.text:
Welcome' signs will find out the hard way,
when it's too late, that what they've wished

320.text:
for is not what they want. And when women's
safety and freedom in Europe eventually become

326.text:
so constricted that they're effectively relegated
back to the shadows, it will be very unfortunate,

333.text:
but what can we do? If third world Muslim
men insist that uncovered women are asking

339.text:
to be molested (and they do) who's going to
argue with them? Only a racist, surely, or

346.text:
a far-right hate monger. Certainly not a progressive
feminist. She knows her place.
